remarks: An increasing sequence of closed sets in a Noetherian-type closure system eventually fixates.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
statement:
nacsfix $p |- ( ( C e. ( NoeACS ` X ) /\ F : NN0 --> C /\ A. x e. NN0 ( F ` x ) C_ ( F ` ( x + 1 ) ) ) -> E. y e. NN0 A. z e. ( ZZ>= ` y ) ( F ` z ) = ( F ` y ) ) $.
$d C y z $.
$d C z $.
$d F x z $.
$d F y z $.
$d X y z $.
$d X z $.
$d x y z $.
